subject: From Post Office -Madrid Spain
body:
From Post Office -Madrid Spain
Two Post Offices -Madrid Spain
Correios - Madrid Spain.
Address: Plaza del Rey nº 1 28004 Madrid, Spain
Telephone, +34 69876567
E-mail, 
posto5658@gmail.com
Wave
Re: Correios -Madrid Espanha urgently to avoid expiration.
 
By regular mail Madrid Spain, Inform you that we exist
It is a parcel that contains a Multibanco Cartão in this post deposited by a
Private organization organization on August 2, 2023.
 
Your e-mail address has been attached to it and will be sent to you. Us
We have been waiting for you to contact us to obtain your Cartão
Conformable multibank that contains more than €800,000 Euros and some
vital documents then Please, come back to this desk (Correio Regular Madrid Espanha)
to avoid fraudulent inquiries related to this service.
 
You must confirm and provide us with your postal address below through
I straighten up,
 
 
Its full name..........
Your country............
His postal address.....
Your direct phone.....
 
Note: each claim has a validity period of fourteen useful days,
So you have it very urgently to avoid expiration.
 
Obliged
Sincerely
Contact person
Mr .Robert Dewey

subject: Re: From Post Office -Madrid Spain
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information regarding the parcel that contains a Multibanco Cart. Could you please provide me with more details about this package? I would like to know who sent it and what documents are included.

Also, could you clarify why my address was attached to this parcel? I want to make sure there hasn't been any mistake or misunderstanding.

Lastly, I would like to confirm the authenticity of this message. Can you please provide some form of verification or reference number related to the parcel?

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Josephine
